pkgmetadata.longdescription: ============================Tencent Cloud SDK for Python============================Tencent Cloud Python Yunsou SDK is the official software development kit, which allows Python developers to write software that makes use of Tencent Cloud services like CVM and CBS.The SDK works on Python versions: * 2.7 and greater, including 3.xQuick Start-----------First, install the library:.. code-block:: sh $ pip install tencentcloud-sdk-python-common $ pip install tencentcloud-sdk-python-yunsouor download source code from github and install:.. code-block:: sh $ git clone https://github.com/tencentcloud/tencentcloud-sdk-python.git $ cd tencentcloud-sdk-python $ python package.py --components common yunsou
